evidence.claim: Higginbotham Public Sector utilizes AWS for their cloud infrastructure.
The company emphasizes compliance with HIPAA regulations in its health tech solutions.
They implement HL7 and FHIR standards for health data exchange.
Integration middleware patterns are documented for seamless connectivity.
Higginbotham's solutions are built on cloud-native technologies including Azure services.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of using X12 or EDI in services offered.
